```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
```


```{r}
set.seed(10)

x <- nhanes |>
  filter(age >= 18 & age <= 27) |>
  select(height, sex) |>
  drop_na() |>
  slice_sample(n = 50) 
```

Today we will attempt to predict a Marine Corps recruit's height. The data source used will be "nhanes" and will be utilized to predict whether we can predict a recruit's height.
